summary: A retexture for "Unicorn by Holugar" that will make the unicorn Blue & transparent
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]NOTE FOR 2014: Skyrim team has also made a spectral horse (no mod needed), if you want to try it press "~" inside the game and write "player.placeatme 10bf90" then ENTER.
[/b][/size]
*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***

This file is a patch(retexture)!
You first must download the unicorn mod by Holugar to use it
[b]Download Link: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13606]Here[/url][/b]

[b]My other Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16413/?]Angry Birds Arrows For skyrim[/url]
[/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14617/?]Bamboo Quarterstaffs And Bows For Skyrim[/url][/b]
author: Majistik
